about_the_game:
This Pack includes:

  • MiG-23ML (Rank 7 USSR);

  • Premium account for 20 days;

  • 2500 Golden Eagles.

The MiG-23ML is an improved variant of the standard M version, developed in the mid 1970s.

The primary and most impactful differences are the enhanced manoeuvrability due to the refined airframe (The L in the name stands for ‘’Lyogkiy’’, meaning lightweight) the MiG-23ML also received a more powerful engine, improving its flight characteristics even further. Aside from the impressive performance, the MiG-23ML comes equipped with a wide loadout, including R-60M, R-23R/T, R-24R/T or R-13M1 air-to-air missiles, a double barrel 23 mm cannon under the fuselage, along with a good amount of large-calibre flares. It can also carry a wide variety of bombs and unguided rockets, including a pair of huge Kh-23M air-to-ground guided missiles to defeat enemy armor.

Overall the MiG-23ML is an agile and lethal aircraft, one which allows you to create a versatile loadout of air or ground weaponry to take on and defeat any contemporary enemy in the air or on the ground.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.
detailed_description:
Note!

This product cannot be purchased for PlayStation® or Xbox accounts!

This DLC will only be granted to the Steam account that was used to make the purchase. If you have some issues, please contact our support (login on the website and use the "Submit a request" button at the top).


About the Game

This Pack includes:

  • MiG-23ML (Rank 7 USSR);

  • Premium account for 20 days;

  • 2500 Golden Eagles.

The MiG-23ML is an improved variant of the standard M version, developed in the mid 1970s.

The primary and most impactful differences are the enhanced manoeuvrability due to the refined airframe (The L in the name stands for ‘’Lyogkiy’’, meaning lightweight) the MiG-23ML also received a more powerful engine, improving its flight characteristics even further. Aside from the impressive performance, the MiG-23ML comes equipped with a wide loadout, including R-60M, R-23R/T, R-24R/T or R-13M1 air-to-air missiles, a double barrel 23 mm cannon under the fuselage, along with a good amount of large-calibre flares. It can also carry a wide variety of bombs and unguided rockets, including a pair of huge Kh-23M air-to-ground guided missiles to defeat enemy armor.

Overall the MiG-23ML is an agile and lethal aircraft, one which allows you to create a versatile loadout of air or ground weaponry to take on and defeat any contemporary enemy in the air or on the ground.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.

name: War Thunder - MiG-23ML Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1, Windows 7
  • Processor:2,2 GHz
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 6XXX series or higher; AMD Radeon 1XXX series or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows 7
  • Processor:Dual-Core 2,4 GHz
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 460 or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 MB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

short_description: MiG-23M fighter-bomber, premium bonuses, 2500 Golden Eagles and 20 days of Premium account - for the most crushing victories in War Thunder!
